product_name: Dude Girl Daisy Dude Girl Bike Shorts - Women's
long_description: Dude Girl made their Daisy Dude Girl Bike Shorts with comfort-enhancing and attractive touches that women will appreciate, whether they're on the road for one hour or six. 8-panel construction is 80% nylon and 20% spandex to move with you as you pedal. High-quality Italian chamois has antimicrobial properties, offers excellent stretch/recovery, prevents heat buildup and is easily washable. 2-1/2 inch band at leg openings add comfort and style, letting you ride without tugging or binding. Waistband is elastic-free for comfort, sporting a low and comfortable rise in front and a higher rise at back for extended coverage. Dude Girl Daisy Dude Girl Bike Shorts for women are made in the USA.
short_description: Dude Girl made their Daisy Dude Girl Bike Shorts with comfort-enhancing and attractive touches that women will appreciate, whether they're on the road for one hour or six.
